title: Salvage Union Array Definitions
description: Shared array type definitions for Salvage Union game data. This schema contains ONLY array definitions - object definitions belong in objects.schema.json

traits.description: Special traits and properties of items, systems, or abilities

actions.description: Actions that can be performed with this entity

choices.description: Choices available to the player when interacting with the entity

schemaEntities.description: Entity names that can be chosen

actionOptions.description: List of options or choices for an action

items.description: Structured option with label and value

label.description: Display label for the option (empty string if no label)

value.description: Description or effect of the option
